standard.description: These tests run against the DB objects and therefore may be hard to associate with a given application. They can be associated with the Application Standards Tracker app.

test.query_clob:
select 'N' pass_yn, 
       ao.object_name view_name, 
       apex_string.format('View `%0` is invalid',
              p0 => ao.object_name) code,
       ao.object_id unqid,
			 ao.owner schema
from v_user_objects ao
where ao.status != 'VALID'
and ao.object_type = 'VIEW'
